messages.error.load_config.title: Configuration error
messages.error.load_config.desc: Configuration falled back to default because an error was encountered.
messages.entry.create.tip1: You can use absolute paths, relative paths or just a name

messages.entry.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item permanently?

settings.general.default_tab.list_column: Set the columns that are shown at the list view by default
